SEARCH
Package com.safetynetalerts.api.service

Class AlertService

java.lang.Object
com.safetynetalerts.api.service.AlertService
@Service public class AlertService extends Object
Service providing various alerting functionalities for the SafetyNet Alerts API. It includes retrieving person data based on firestation number, address, city, and other criteria, as well as calculating relevant information like age. This service interacts with PersonService, FirestationService, and MedicalRecordService to gather the necessary data and compute results, often returning DTO objects to represent the processed data.

    • getPersonPerStation

      public FirestationDTO getPersonPerStation(int stationNumber)
      Get a list of persons covered by a specific firestation.
      Parameters:
      stationNumber - The firestation number to retrieve persons for.
      Returns:
      A FirestationDTO containing the persons and a count of adults and children.

    • getChildPerAddress

      public ChildAlertDTO getChildPerAddress(String address)
      Get children living at a specific address.
      Parameters:
      address - The address to check for children.
      Returns:
      A ChildAlertDTO containing children and family members living at the address.

    • getPhonePerStation

      public PhoneAlertDTO getPhonePerStation(int firestationNumber)
      Get phone numbers of persons covered by a specific firestation.
      Parameters:
      firestationNumber - The firestation number to retrieve phone numbers for.
      Returns:
      A PhoneAlertDTO containing the phone numbers of people covered by the firestation.

    • getPersonPerAddress

      public FireDTO getPersonPerAddress(String address)
      Get persons and associated medical information for a specific address.
      Parameters:
      address - The address to check for persons.
      Returns:
      A FireDTO containing persons' medical information and the firestation number.

    • getHomePerStation

      public List<FloodDTO> getHomePerStation(Integer[] stationNumbers)
      Get homes covered by specific firestations.
      Parameters:
      stationNumbers - An array of firestation numbers to retrieve homes for.
      Returns:
      A list of FloodDTO objects, each representing a home and its residents' medical information.

    • getInfoPerPerson

      public List<PersonInfoLastNameDTO> getInfoPerPerson(String lastName)
      Get medical and contact information for all persons with a specific last name.
      Parameters:
      lastName - The last name to search for.
      Returns:
      A list of PersonInfoLastNameDTO objects with information on persons with the given last name.

    • getEmail

      public List<String> getEmail(String city)
      Get emails of persons living in a specific city.
      Parameters:
      city - The city to retrieve emails for.
      Returns:
      A list of unique email addresses for persons living in the given city.

      Calculate the age of a person based on their birthdate.
      Parameters:
